item.description:
This will be our first meet up event for the year and is planned to be an exciting event.
This event will be an indoor photo shoot.

There will be a model joining us for a couple of sessions withing the event.

The first shoot will be "beauty" skin care. - I need a model with great skin and hands for this. Model will be expected to wear a robe and towel wrap in some shots.

The second shoot will be a T-shirt -(Polo) type. - Need 1 male model who wears a size L or XL, with jeans or Khaki pants will do.

The goal is to show you work with you on the aspects of an editorial shoot.
We will begin promptly at 10:00am with a meet and greet. To discuss the 2 photo sessions. During this time I will assign an assistant stylist for each session.


See you next week

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Photo shoot meetup January 2011
